headline: Analyst Sentiment on VICI Properties (VICI) Remains Strong Amid Stable Fundamentals and Strong Balance Sheet
summary: VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) is one of the 13 Best Extremely Profitable Stocks to Invest in Now. As of February 2, 2026, the consensus price target for VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE:VICI) is $35.00, which implies a 24.64% upside potential. Meanwhile, 80% of analysts remain bullish on the stock. The latest analyst update came on January […]
